Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: All rates at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our hotel staff is famous for their friendly, helpful service. That's why we're the proud recipients of TripAdvisor's 2014 Certificate of Excellence.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Events here at the hotel really shine, thanks to our innovative and free-flowing venue space, experienced planning services, and delicious catering.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Whether you're in Stockholm for work or for a relaxing vacation, you'll be pleased with our spacious rooms, all of which are at least 280 square feet.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: A refreshing hotel experience awaits you at the Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen. You'll love our city centre location and spacious, modern accommodations.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen redefines comfortable, environmentally conscious hotel living here in the heart of the city centre. Stylishly appointed accommodations offer deluxe bedding, complimentary Internet access, and oversized windows with breathtaking views of Stockholm's Lake Malaren and nearby Ralambshovs Park. Additional amenities throughout the hotel include a modern on-site gym and bike rentals, enabling you to explore Stockholm city centre with ease. Be sure to spend some time at BJORK Bar & Grill, our popular restaurant, which is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. If you're planning a meeting in Sweden's capital city, you can take advantage of our hotel's 11,410 square feet of flexible and well-equipped event space, which is easily configurable into smaller venues. And of course, our city centre location places you moments from the famed Old Town, the Skansen open-air museum, City Hall, and more. Visit us here in Sweden, and see what makes the Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen so special.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located on the island of Kungsholmen, the hotel is situated within walking distance to the city. You have the Rålambshov park and lake Mälaren across the street and many public transportation options close by. Very easy access to the 2 local airports.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Make yourself at home here in Stockholm, in one of our spacious and well-appointed hotel rooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: All of our accommodations include coffee and tea makers, mini-fridges, and laptop-sized safes.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: If you're in Stockholm for business, you'll appreciate the ergonomic work space in your hotel room.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Free Wi-Fi access keeps you connected, and a flat-screen TV help you to relax after a busy day.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Enjoy plenty of beautiful natural light and stunning park views in most of our hotel accommodations.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Upgrade to a studio room during your Sweden stay, and enjoy a whirlpool tub in your bathroom.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Make yourself at home here in Stockholm, in one of our spacious and well-appointed hotel rooms.
All of our accommodations include coffee and tea makers, mini-fridges, and laptop-sized safes.
If you're in Stockholm for business, you'll appreciate the ergonomic work space in your hotel room.
Free Wi-Fi access keeps you connected, and a flat-screen TV help you to relax after a busy day.
Enjoy plenty of beautiful natural light and stunning park views in most of our hotel accommodations.
Upgrade to a studio room during your Sweden stay, and enjoy a whirlpool tub in your bathroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Refreshing event menus just right for you!

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: All of our 13 contemporary meeting rooms feature high-speed Internet and audiovisual facilities.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Meeting guests will appreciate perks like in-room ergonomic chairs and a large lobby check-in area.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Awash in natural daylight, our spacious and modern meeting rooms make doing business a pleasure.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our team will always go the extra mile to ensure that your event here in Stockholm is successful.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Attendees staying with us will love our high-tech hotel facilities and terrific Stockholm location.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our hotel places you near the Ericsson Globe, Stockholm's premier concert and event venue.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Explore Stockholm's fascinating Old Town, or visit City Hall, where the Nobel festivities are held.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Attend an event at Stockholm Convention Centre, or head across the street to Rålambshovs Park.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Shopping at the Vastermalms gallery - lots of different shops under one roof

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Boule Bar & Restaurant in Ralambshov Park

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: You can go swimming or fishing in the lake Malaren across the street.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Celebrate a truly unforgettable wedding or social event with us in the heart of Stockholm, Sweden.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: We offer over 11,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, filled with natural light.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our Kungsholmen venue is the largest, and can accommodate up to 200 guests for a wedding reception.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Use our elegant, flexible restaurant space as a venue for your special occasion here in Stockholm.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our venues flow beautifully, allowing wedding guests to move from one area to another with ease.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Host your next Stockholm event with us. Our team is ready to assist you plan a memorable event.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Treat yourself to delicious Swedish and international cuisine at BJORK Bar & Grill. A popular restaurant choice among hotel guests and Stockholm residents alike, BJORK features fresh local fare and is open for breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The food philosophy focuses on introducing innovative, international cuisine with unusual and surprising flavor combinations. Fredsgatan 12 has a Michelin star.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The concept is all about flavours, where you are given three choices - three, five or seven small dishes in which the influential flavor gives its name to the dish.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Here you will be served grilled food from five continents prepared with five different barbecue techniques.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Brasserie Lerouge is a warm and cozy Brasserie located in Old Town. The decor consists of bright colors, heavy fabrics and contemporary details that are reminiscent of the Moulin Rouge

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Miss Voon is a modern restaurant that combines tastes from all the Asian cultures with European cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Interpretation of traditional Swedish fare using seasonal locally produced ingredients.

Description.Name: Is Written Authorization Required for Credit Card Deposits
Direction to City Center
Description.Text: Fridhemsplan is only a short walk away from the hotel. Exit the main entrance and take the stairs to your left up to Drottningholmsvagen. Take right on Drottningholmsvagen and just follow this road and it will take you to Fridhemsplan.

Description.Name: Brief Property Location Description
Description.Text: A modern, inviting and colorful hotel with spacious rooms and relaxing public spaces

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take Highway E4 heading south towards Stockholm. Keep straight for about 30 mins, take exit 161 towards Bromma/ Vällingby. At the first red lights directly after exiting the E4, take a right and keep on straight until a roundabout. Keep straight in the roundabout and take the first left, the hotel is on your left hand side. You will be able to see the hotel already from the highway.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy traditional Swedish food in the sun right across the Ralambshovs park

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Slow period due to the Christmas and school holidays. Possibility to offer very flexible rates for both leisure and business travellers. Usually a nice time of year with white snow and cold but nice temperatures.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Sport holiday for the schools around Stockholm. Always week 9 and this effects the Swedish business travellers. Possibility to be flexible with rates through out this week. Nice but cold temperatures, proper winter.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Top peak months for business and conference segment. Weekends can still be slow as the main leisure business is in summer. Easter is always a low period with very flexible rates. Spring is starting in March and days get longer and the temeratures rise.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Medium period where the business segment picks up quite fast. Mid weeks the occupancy is normally high here as the business segement is fully up and running. Weeekends are still slow as leisure segment is not so big here. Cold but nice temp.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Summer season where the business segement slows down. Great time for MICE groups as we are able to offer flexible rates and the local conference business is quiet. Great time to visit Sweden as the weather is nice and warm and Stockholm is not so busy.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Top peak months for business and conference segment. Weekends can still be slow as the main leisure business is in summer. Good time to travel weekends for leisure as the weather can be nice and can offer flexible rates.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Autumn school holiday has a big impact on the Swedish business segment and here we can offer very flexible rates for business both weekdays and weekends.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Still good demand from the business segemtn however not as high as May, June and September. Somewhat more flexible with rates. Weekends very flexible with rates. Winter is getting closer and temeratures are dropping to around 0 degrees.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The hotel is located in an upper market residential area with one of Stockholm's most popular parks just across the street. It’s the perfect place to start your sightseeing of Stockholm, with City Hall only a 20 min scenic promenade from the hotel. As one of few hotels in the city with large private parking areas, the hotel is very easy accessible with buses. You also find a private underground parking garage, only available for hotel guest. All 278 hotel rooms are minimum 26 sqm, a size bigger than most hotel rooms in Stockholm. About half of the rooms have a view overlooking the park. 70 of the rooms hold twin beds, all similar in size and design which make the hotel very well suited for groups. The rooms are all furnished in bright and calm Nordic colors, equipped with everything you need both for a relaxing and productive stay.Our conference floor holds 1 100 sqm of modern and flexible meeting rooms, divided on 13 meeting and events spaces. Here you have the boardroom on the 11th floor with panoramic views over the area, the grand ballroom that seats up to 380 guests in theatre seating and 280 guests in banquet dinners and the cool event space that is perfect for a Christmas party, car launch or any event that has to be out of the ordinary. The warm and professional service, the modern meeting and banquet rooms all with natural daylight and equipped with the latest technology are there to ensure you a successful meeting or event.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Competitive strengths: large rooms for the Stockholm market, no smaller than 26 m2; free WiFi in entire hotel; underground secure parking; welcoming lobby with open fire place and laptop ports; safe location in an upper market residential area; easy accessible from both airports; within walking distance of public transport (bus and subway); park access opposite hotel with running tracks, beach, bath cliffs and other activities in summer; multi-lingual staff; within walking distance of shops, cafés, bars and restaurants as well as the direct city centre; walking distance to famous City Hall. Ideal business segment: All business segments and extended stays. Great group hotel as rooms are all very similar in size and standard. Large number of connecting rooms suitable for families. Large number of wheelchair accessible rooms.Peak periods: From Jan to mid June and fron mid Aug to end NovemberPeak days: Tuesday through ThursdayIdeal meeting size: 12-350Ideal group size: 10-200Need: Weekend biz

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Newly built hotel that opened 8th February 2010. 278 spacious rooms no smaller than 26 m2 which is large compared to the competition. All rooms have large panoramic windows that are 3-phase which makes the rooms very quiet.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Large and flexible conference area of 1100 m2 where all rooms apart from one is located on the same floor. All rooms have natural daylight and high technical standards. The public area is flexible and offers many different set-up solutions.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Hotel offers free WiFi in the entire hotel.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Hotel offers under ground secure car parking. Also have great drop off and pick up area and parking area for up to 2 buses.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: Direct access to the park across the street with both the lake Mälaren as well as activities such as beach volley ball, boule and jogging tracks.

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: The Stadium Course is ranked #1 by Golf Digest and Svensk Golf since opening in September 2007. The second course, The Castle Course (also designed by Robert Trent Jones Jr), opened in July 2010
